Source.Name: libsysstat
Source.Summary: Library used to query system info and statistics.
Source.Description: Library used to query system information like CPU and memory usage or network traffic. Conceptually, it is roughly similar to libstatgrab.

Package.Name: libsysstat
Package.Summary: Library used to query system info and statistics.
Package.Description: Library used to query system information like CPU and memory usage or network traffic. Conceptually, it is roughly similar to libstatgrab.

Package.Description: Library used to query system information like CPU and memory usage or network traffic. Conceptually, it is roughly similar to libstatgrab.
